description.value: The ability to move elegantly and undetected through darkness aided your people as they fled the Netherworld. You can move 5 feet farther when you take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] action, up to your Speed. In addition, as long as you continue to use Sneak actions and succeed at your Stealth check, you don't become observed if you end a Sneak action in dim light or darkness, as long as you have cover or greater cover or are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] at the end of your turn.
